Sentencas: The scandia-stabilized zirconia (SSZ) electrolyte supported by Ni-YSZ anode was prepared by tape casting and co-firing techniques.
Titulo: Optimization of the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode by Tape Casting

Sentencas: In order to improve the electrochemical activity, a Ni-SSZ anode active layer was introduced between the supporting anode and the electrolyte film.
Titulo: Optimization of the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode by Tape Casting

Sentencas: The anode activity was optimized by adjusting the thickness and mass ratio of SSZ: NiO in the active layer.
Titulo: Optimization of the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode by Tape Casting

Sentencas: The pore distribution and porosity of supporting anode were optimized by comparing the performance of cells with different content of pore fowler in the supporting anode.
Titulo: Optimization of the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode by Tape Casting

Sentencas: As a result, the thickness of active layer was optimized to be 35 mu m, with w(SSZ):w(NiO)=1:1, and 10wt% carbon as anode pore former.
Titulo: Optimization of the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode by Tape Casting

Sentencas: The composite cathode of LSM-SSZ was prepared by screen printing and sintering method, and the maximum power density of single cell as high as 0.96 W/cm(2) was obtained at 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Optimization of the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode by Tape Casting

Sentencas: The performance was about 2.3 times higher than what previously reported by our group.
Titulo: Optimization of the Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode by Tape Casting
